price: E kështu u përmbush fjala e Zotit kundër nesh; ne të gjithë do ta shijojmë me siguri dënimin.
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
